Type.BattleDialog: She said she’ll give me a prize if I bring her books. I can’t wait!
This looks larger than our town… And I’m seeing lots of tiny people like mommy…
A good kid does whatever they’re told to without complaining!
Mommy will be happy if I bring a bunch of books with me, right?
I think daddy’s gonna praise me as well this time!
…I feel empty. It’s like part of me disappeared. I’m sad… I feel like crying……
They look even stronger than the bad guys who bully our town…
My friends… They’re in so much pain… What do I do…?
Ah… M—Mommy might punish me…
We’re here to bring peace with our townspeople!
If mommy sees me working hard… She’ll praise me, right? Hooray…
Do you like playing together? Me too, it’s so fun and joyful!
I’m so lonely, it’s unbearable to be alone… Where did I go?
…Where are you. I’m so scared… Come back to my side. Tommy… Tommy…
If you don’t understand the power of love… This will help you get it.
This is punishment for harrassing me.
…For my dear mom.
Wihl hit you and… hiih… yew agaih…
Ledts… fold dem up… into a staar…
Baad… guies need… hahsh punishent…
Fohr… eveyone… I’ll cher up…
I don’t like gedding huhrt…
L’ll bee a big helf… to evhryone…
Momi tol us… notto oerdo ourseves…
Love is… a guud thiing…
Is okay… Our lov… ’an beet evhryting…
Weer gona goge ‘rizes…
Wat kind o…f ‘rizes wil she givus thi time… Iwana bee biiig lik Tomerry…
Wee don… loose to anneon…
Thiisi hte pow…er o’ lov…
Don ‘derstimae hte powpow of stron luv…
I don… wamma die…
I wamaa be wih the townspeop…le I love…
The…y got… mii…
Im scared… S…ave me…
Am s…orr…y… I won’t do i…t again…
I mighh be leff alone…
No wana be bulli…
Itdee grape if yu coul’derstan luv wihh us…
Please do…n’t bulli our towwspeople… Pwease…
M… Maybe we shuud run…?
W…e’ll beet dem back…
Eet’s okay… Tha…e’s not t…oo mamy…
I tuk… down that babdie…
We ca…hn make iih…
I stee…il can figh morr…
